entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Estevan Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:28 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain this morning. Wet snow inland. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm inland. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning except 60 over exposed coastal sections this afternoon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy mixed with wet snow. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Snowfall amount 10 cm inland. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 late this evening except 70 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain showers and wet flurries with risk of hail. Wind northwest 40 km/h except 70 over exposed coastal sections early in the morning. Wind becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of showers. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.summary: Rain. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.summary: Rain. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.summary: Showers. High 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
